text: Roth is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Abenberg #Greding #Heideck #Hilpoltstein #Roth #Spalt #Allersberg #Büchenbach #Georgensgmünd #Kammerstein #Rednitzhembach #Rohr #Röttenbach #Schwanstetten #Thalmässing #Wendelstein ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website (German) Category:Districts of Bavaria
